title: Can you actually be banned from a fellow league player reporting you??
body: When a Flamer (70% of the league community) says your reported it just doesn't seem to scare me what so ever... is this because nothing will actually happen or am i just unaware of the "reporting" system?

replies.body:
We have several systems that use reports. Including but not limited to

Chat restrictions, leaver buster and intentional feeder bans. You can learn more about them here;

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752984-Restricted-Chat-Mode
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

Let me know if you have any other questions!

So basically if you under perform in a ranked game which makes your team very angry. You may be banned due to SHEER NUMBER OR REPORTS RECEIVED AGAINST YOU. 

I bet you didn't know that  :D
